div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If patient has not been vaccinated, give Rabies vaccine

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Rabies (PrEP strategy) - No Doses
description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme
"Individual is at high risk of RABV exposure" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Rabies (PrEP strategy) - 1 Dose
description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)
description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – BOOSTER" schedule (1 dose booster)

tr.td: "Individual has continual or frequent risk of exposure (i.e. occupational)" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)
Should vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)
